lines.gurmukhi: kkhI dY mwg aurJwey surJwey kys kuMkm cMdn ko iqlk dy llwr mY
lines.transliteration_english: Kakahee Dai Maag Urajhaaay Surajhaaay Kaysa , Kounkam Chandan Ko Tilak Day Lalaar Mai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: She should comb her entangled hair and create a neat parting in her hair, apply a dot of saffron and sandalwood on her forehead.

lines.gurmukhi: AMjn KMjn diRg bysir krn PUl bwrI sIs PUl dY qmol rs muK duAwr mY
lines.transliteration_english: Anjan Khanjan Drig Baysari Karan Dhoola , Baaree Sees Dhool Dai Tamol Ras Moukh Duaar Mai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Put collyrium in her frolicsome eyes, a ring in the nose, earrings, wear dome-shaped ornament on the head and wait at the main entrance chewing betel leaf.

lines.gurmukhi: kMTsrI kpoiq mrkq Aau mukqwhl brn brn PUl soBw aur hwr mY
lines.transliteration_english: Kantthasaree Kapoti Marakat Au Moukataahala , Baran Baran Dhool Sobhaa Ur Haar Mai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Wear diamond and pearl-studded necklace and adorn her heart with colourful flowers of virtuous qualities,

lines.gurmukhi: ccrcrI kMkn muMidkw mhdI bnI AMgIAw AnUp CudRpIiT kt Dwr mY ]347]
lines.transliteration_english: Chacharacharee Kankan Moundikaa Mahadee Banee , Angeeaa Anoop Chhudrapeetthi Kat Dhaar Mai ?347?

Shabad OS B.translation: Wear colourful rings in her fingers, bracelets, bangles on her wrists, apply henna on her hands, wear a beautiful bodice and a black thread with trinkets around her waist. Note: All the above adornments are related to the virtues and Naam Simran of the Si
